channel.title: How to add gfx to dragon claws?
channel.description: i want dragon claws to have like the dragon claw gfx like the red waves when hitting. can someone help me i dont know how to add. i would like to know though.

item.title: How to add gfx to dragon claws?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:6, topic:266613”]well O_o it can be a lot of files… its mostly g-ziped files

-just got your question

its in client.java[/quote]I bet he doesn’t know how to add a GFX to a client. So it’s like reading to a deaf kid.

Read full topic

item.title: How to add gfx to dragon claws?
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

you can try to search some GFX and Emotes for your server

STEPS

step1: Make a client
step2: add gfx and animations to client
step3: compile
step4: add them into your Server
step5: compile server
step6: completion
